ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui

Class Style

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.Style

  • public final class Style
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an encapsulation of style information, which may be applied to genome data through the GUIController to create a customized genome visualization. All modifications to the style should be done through the style's associated StyleController.
    Author:
    Eric Marinier
